〈名〉Windows and orphan; helpless persons

content:
かんかつ〔管轄〕
〈名〉Jurisdiction; competence; control:(=する) to exercise jurisdiction over (a district); to have competence over (a matter); to control (a school, etc.)

content.content: 小笠原島は東京府の管轄に属す
The Bonin Islands are under the jurisdiction of―subject to the jurisdiction of―Tokyo prefecture.
この事件は本裁判所の管轄でない
The case does not fall within the jurisdiction of this court―The case is outside the jurisdiction of this court.
それは管轄違いだ
It is outside our jurisdiction.
学校は文部省の管轄だ
The school is under the control of the Educational Department.
管轄範囲内
within the sphere of jurisdiction
管轄裁判所
a competent court
管轄官庁
the competent authorities

かんがっき〔管楽器〕
〈名〉A wind-instrument

content:
かんかふぐう〔轗軻不遇〕
〈名〉Being neglected by the world

content.content: 轗軻不遇の身だ
I am neglected by the world―unappreciated by the world.
彼は轗軻不遇の中に一生を終った
He lived and died neglected by the world―unappreciated by the world.
轗軻不遇の恨みを呑んで死んだ
He died of mere despite at the world's neglect.

content:
かんがみる〔鑑みる〕
〈他動〉
1. (=手本に照らして見る)to take example by (good men); to take warning by (bad men)

content.content: 青年はこの成功者にかんがみて奮励すべし
Let young men take example by this successful man and bestir themselves.
学生は他の失敗にかんがみて自ら戒むべし
The student should take warning by others' failure and guard against it.

content: 2. (=考え見る)to consider, have regard to (circumstances)

content.content: 選挙権の拡張は国の情況にかんがみてこれを行うべし
Suffrage must be extended with due consideration to the state of things in the country.
軍備の拡張は世界の形勢にかんがみてこれを決せざるべからず
The increase of armaments must be determined with due regard to the situation of the world.
教育は時勢にかんがみて施さざるべからず
Education should be conducted with due regard to the times.
時局にかんがみて事業を中止した
The project was abandoned in view of the situation.

content:
カンカン
〈副〉Brightly

content.content: 日がカンカンと照っている
The sun is shining brightly.

content:
かんかん〔侃々〕
〈副〉Unbendingly; unyieldingly

content.content: 侃々諤々の議論をする
to be an obstinate disputant

かんかん〔看貫〕
〈名〉A weighing machine; a weigh-bridge

content.content: 汗顔の至り

そうお賞めにあずかっては汗顔の至りです

content:

凱旋記念として東京湾に観艦式が挙行された

What a sight the review must have been!

content:
がんがんする〔ガンガンする〕
〈自動〉To ring; to throb

content.content: 頭がガンガンする

My ears ring―I have a ringing in my ears―a singing in my ears.

content:
がんがんする〔ガンガンする〕
〈自動〉To ring; to throb

content.content: 頭がガンガンする
My head throbs.
耳がガンガンする
My ears ring―I have a ringing in my ears―a singing in my ears.

content:
かんき〔寒気〕
〈名〉The cold

content.content: 寒気が催して来た

寒気をしのぐ
to keep out the cold―keep oneself warm
この外套を着ていれば寒気はしのげる
This overcoat will keep me warm.
寒気を防ぐ

content:

content.content: 君の勘気をこうむる

〈名〉Awakening:(=する) to arouse (one's interest); to awaken (one's sympathy); to excite (one's suspicion, etc.)

content.content: 学生の英語に対する趣味を喚起する

content:

官紀振粛

content:

content.content: 人工換気法

事成就した暁には勝てば官軍で誰も苦情を言う者が無くなる

content:
かんけい〔関係〕
〈名〉
1. Relation (to a person or thing―between two persons or things); connection (with a person or thing―between two persons or things); reference (to a person or thing); concern (with a person or thing):(=する) to relate to, be related to, have relation to, stand in a relation to (a person or thing); to be connected with, have some connection with (a thing); to refer to, bear reference to (a matter); to concern (one); have concern with, have to do with (an affair); to bear on (a matter)

content.content: これは事件に関係ある書類だ
These papers relate to the affair―refer to the affair―bear reference to the affair―have relation to the affair.
物価は需用供給の関係によって定まる
Price are regulated by the relation between demand and supply.
師弟の関係は今は昔と違う
The relation between teacher and pupil is not now what it used to be.
僕は彼と師弟の関係だ
I stand to him in the relation of teacher and pupil.
彼とは親類関係がある
I am related to him―He is my relation.
彼は学校に関係がある
He is connected with the school―He has some connection with the school.
二者は密接な関係がある
There is an intimate relation between the two―a close connection between the two―The two are intimately related to each other―closely connected with each other.
これとあれとは関係が無い
This has no relation to that―This has no connection with that―This has no concern with that―This has nothing to do with that.
あの人は官辺に関係が深い
He has much concern with―has much to do with―office men.
君の質問は本件には何の関係も無い
Your question has nothing to do with the matter in hand―Your question does not bear on the matter in hand.
君の言うことは本件にどんな関係があるか
How does your remark bear on this matter?
それは僕には関係の無いことだ
The matter does not concern me.
その評判が本当であろうと嘘であろうと我々に関係の無いことだ
The report, whether true of false, does not concern us.
関係者
a person concerned
関係者諸君に申す
To whomever this may concern―
関係を設ける
to establish a relation to anything―establish a connection with anything
関係を断つ
to sever relations―sever connections
僕は政党には関係しない
I keep clear of―stand clear of―party politics.
親類関係
relation―family-relation―blood-relation―kinship
彼と親類関係は無い
I am not related to him―I am no relation to him―He is no relation of mine.
読書の精神に対する関係は食物の身体に対する関係の如し
Reading is to the mind what food is to the body.

content: 2. (=交際関係)relations (with a person)

content.content: 君はあの人と何か関係があるか
(親類関係を問うなら)Are you related to him?―Are you any relation to him?―(交際関係を問うなら)―Have you any relations with him?
彼とは関係が浅い
I have but slight relations with him.
二人は関係が深い
They are in intimate relations with each other.
二人の間には離るべからざる関係がある
They are bound up in each other.
国際関係
international relations
国交関係、外交関係
diplomatic relations
国交関係逼迫す
The diplomatic relations are strained.
国交関係を絶つ
to break off diplomatic relations―sever diplomatic relations
国交関係の断絶
rupture of diplomatic relations―severance of diplomatic relations
日露関係の断絶
Japan's rupture with Russia.
朋輩関係
friendly relations―comradeship

content: 3. (=男女関係)sexual relations; relations (with a man or a woman); connection (with a man or a woman); an intrigue (with a man or a woman); a liaison (with a man or a woman):(=する) to have relations, have connection with, have a liaison with, have an intrigue with, intrigue with (a man or woman)

content.content: 彼はあの女に関係がある
He has relations with the girl―a connection with the girl―an intrigue with the girl―a liaison with the girl.
僕は女に関係したことが無い
I never had any relations with a woman.
女に関係をつける
to have connection with a woman

content: 4. (=利害関係)an interest (in anything); a concern (in anything):(=する) to concern (one's welfare); to involve (one's safety); to touch (one)

content.content: 東洋の平和に利害関係を有する国々
The powers have an interest in the peace of the East.
君もあの会社に利害関係があるだろう(株主だろう)
You have an interest in the company, have you not?
僕もあの学校に利害関係がある
I have a concern in that school.
日本は支那の治乱に対して重大な関係を有している
Japan is vitally interested in―Japan has a vital interest in―the maintenance of peace in China.
これは僕の一身上に関係のあることだ
The matter concerns my welfare.
僕の一身上に密接の関係あることだ
The matter concerns me nearly―touches me nearly.
これは国家の安危に関係ある問題だ
The question involves the safety of the State.
利害関係者
an interested party

content: 5. (=干与)participation (in an affair); concernment (in an affair); complicity (in a crime); implication (in an affair):(=する) to participate in, take part in (an affair); to concern oneself in, be concerned in (an affair); to be implicated in, be involved in, be entangled in (an affair); to have a hand in, have a finger in (an affair); to have concern with, have concernment with, have to do with (anything)

content.content: この事業に関係した者は皆だいぶ損をしている
Those who participated in the enterprise―took part in the enterprise―all lost heavily.
そんな事件には関係せぬがよい
You had better not concern yourself in such affairs.
小生は本件にはいっさい関係無之

I am not concerned in the affair―I have no concernment with the affair―I have nothing to do with the affair―I have no hand in the affair―I have no art or part in the affair―I have no part nor lot in the affair.
僕はこの事件に関係を絶つ
I wash my hands of the affair.
彼はこの事件にだいぶ関係がある
He is deeply involved in the affair―He has a big finger in the pie.
僕はこんな事件に関係するのはまっぴらだ
I will have nothing to do with such affairs.
僕はあの人とは何の関係も無い
I have nothing to do with him―I have no concernment with him.
商売の方では関係が無い
I have nothing to do with him in the way of business.
お前には今後一切関係しない(絶好する)
I will have nothing more to do with you―I will have nothing more to say to you―I have done with you for the future.
この疑獄には関係者が多い
Many people are implicated in the scandal―involved in the scandal―entangled in the scandal.
彼も陰謀の関係者らしい
He seems to be implicated in the plot―involved in the plot―entangled in the plot.
彼は時々うしろ暗い取引に関係する
He is often mixed up in shady transactions.
彼はこの犯罪に関係が無いと主張している
He denies complicity in the crime.
あのような人には関係するな
Have nothing to do with such men!―Keep clear of such men!
教師たるものは政党などには関係するものでない
A teacher should stand clear of party politics.
この事件にはいっさい関係を断つ
I will cut the whole concern―I will cut the whole connection―I wash my hands of the affair.
政治運動というときっと彼が関係している
He is behind every political movement.
(事件の)関係者
the parties concerned

content: 6. (=影響)influence (on anything):(=する) to have influence on (anything); to affect (anything); to matter to (one); to signify to (one)

content.content: 少しでもキズがあると値段に関係する
The smallest blemish affects the value of the article.
地震は天候に関係があるものか
Do earthquakes affect the weather?―Have earthquakes any influence upon the weather?
黒潮は日本の気候に大いなる関係がある
The Black Current has great influence upon the climate of Japan.
どちらが勝とうと僕には関係が無い
It does not matter to me―signify to me―which side may win.
誕生地は人格に大いに関係する
It matters much to the character―It signifies much to the character―where a man is born.

content:
かんしょう〔干渉〕
〈名〉Interference; intervention:(=する) to interfere in (a matter); to intervene in (an affair); to meddle in, intermeddle in (others' affairs); to poke one's nose into, thrust one's nose into (everything); to put in one's oar, shove in one's oar; to step in

content.content: 君はこのことに干渉する権利が無い
You have no right to interfere in the matter.
君が干渉するとぶちこわすから止せ
If you interfere, you will make a mess of it―Your interference will do more harm than good.
夫婦げんかに干渉するものでない
One should not step into a conjugal quarrel.
人のことに余計な干渉するな
Do not meddle in other people's affairs!
彼は何事にでも干渉したがる男だ
He will poke his nose into everything―thrust his nose into everything―He has an oar in everybody's boat.
政府が人民に干渉し過ぎる
They overgovern the people.
政府の過度干渉
overgovernment
僕にはいっさい干渉してくれるな
Let me alone!―Leave me alone!―Leave me in peace!
無干渉
laissez-faire
三国干渉
the Intervention of the Three Powers
武力的干渉
armed intervention
選挙干渉
governmental interference in election
選挙の不当干渉
undue influence
干渉結婚
a forced marriage
彼は干渉好きだ
He is meddlesome.
干渉家
a meddler―a busybody
